statements: SELECT * FROM ECommerceTransactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, total_amount, payment_method FROM ECommerceTransactions WHERE quantity > 1;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity, total_amount FROM ECommerceTransactions WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM ECommerceTransactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM ECommerceTransactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ECommerceTransactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM ECommerceTransactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM ECommerceTransactions WHERE country = 'USA' GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS average_transaction_amount FROM ECommerceTransactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING average_transaction_amount > 50;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS unique_customers, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM ECommerceTransactions WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM e_commerce_transactions;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM e_commerce_transactions WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM e_commerce_transactions ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, total_amount FROM e_commerce_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_id, predicted_sales FROM sales_forecast WHERE confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM e_commerce_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM e_commerce_transactions GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM e_commerce_transactions GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM e_commerce_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT e.transaction_id, e.customer_id, s.predicted_sales FROM e_commerce_transactions e INNER JOIN sales_forecast s ON e.product_id = s.product_id ORDER BY s.predicted_sales DESC
SELECT * FROM ecommerce_transactions
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM ecommerce_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category_id = 1
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE parent_category_id IS NULL
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category_id = 1 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT transaction_id, product_name, price FROM ecommerce_transactions JOIN products ON ecommerce_transactions.product_id = products.product_id WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT category_name, parent_category_id FROM categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%electronics%' ORDER BY category_id;

SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM categories JOIN products ON categories.category_id = products.category_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING total_products > 5 ORDER BY total_products DESC;

SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_sales FROM ecommerce_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY transaction_id, transaction_date ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_data WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_data GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date, predicted_sales FROM sales_forecasting ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_data WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_data WHERE customer_id = 12345 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';

SELECT product_name, category, predicted_sales FROM product_data JOIN sales_forecasting ON product_data.product_id = sales_forecasting.product_id WHERE predicted_sales > 5000 ORDER BY category, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, address, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY category, price DESC;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date, forecast_quantity FROM sales_forecast WHERE forecast_quantity > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE 'New%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN customer_transactions ct ON c.customer_id = ct.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_forecast sf JOIN products p ON sf.product_id = p.product_id WHERE forecast_quantity > 50 AND forecast_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY forecast_quantity DESC, forecast_date ASC;
